description:
Reentrancy in Licence.load(address,uint256) (../../contracts/licence.sol#201-223):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(_asset).safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,_tokenHolder,licenceAmount) (../../contracts/licence.sol#211)
	- IERC20(_asset).safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,_cryptoFloat,loadAmount) (../../contracts/licence.sol#212)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _tokenHolder.transfer(licenceAmount) (../../contracts/licence.sol#215)
	- _cryptoFloat.transfer(loadAmount) (../../contracts/licence.sol#216)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TransferredToTokenHolder(msg.sender,_tokenHolder,_asset,licenceAmount) (../../contracts/licence.sol#219)
